text:
The malaria drug Hydroxychloroquine 

PUSHED by Trump to treat the #coronavirus showed 
NO benefit in a large study at VA hospitals. 

The mortality rate increased.

#Hydroxychloroquine #Chloroquine #hydroxychloriquine #TrumpBurialPits #TrumpVirus #COVID19 #25thAmendmentNow https://t.co/ERt92Ch0m0
